meanings.definition: Extremely hot or heated to an intense degree.
meanings.sent1: The ultraheated metal glowed brightly in the forge.
meanings.sent2: The ultraheated oven quickly cooked the pizza to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The ultraheated summer sun made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraheated temper flared up at the slightest provocation.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheated lava flowed down the volcano, creating a fiery spectacle.

meanings.definition: Subjected to intense heat or heating.
meanings.sent1: The ultraheated water boiled rapidly in the kettle.
meanings.sent2: The ultraheated metal was molded into intricate shapes.
meanings.sent3: The ultraheated debate in the courtroom kept everyone on edge.
meanings.sent4: His ultraheated passion for cooking led him to become a chef.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheated engine roared to life, propelling the car forward.
